name: Kickoff Legends
description: Kickoff Legends is a multi-player, cross-platform football team management game. It's a real time football multi-player game that is fast and fun. Matches are played in real time. Any platform against any platform!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: x86-64 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD4500 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play the game.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
